column1: products for any sequence in the NCBI nt nucleotide database. The numerator is for any nontarget organism in nt and the denominator is
for any target or nontarget organism in nt, that is, nonspecific/total of the possible primer combinations in the multiplex predicted to yield
product when compared against nt. Vastly more amplicons are produced from target organisms,
species should be a small minority of amplified product.
